message.entry: The number of rows in the multiplier must be less than or equal to the number of columns.
Image must have three or fewer dimensions.
The constant values must be a vector.
The length of the constant values vector must be the same as the number of rows in the multiplier.
The number of columns in the multiplier must match the size of the last dimension in the image.
The constant terms must be floating-point double values.
The output class argument must be a string.
The third argument must be a string or an array of strings.
This function requires two, three, or four input arguments.
The output class must be a valid numeric datatype.
